8cdc2e10-02e6-4941-b983-45ad0aea855f.description: Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ Level 1 accredited professionals have the knowledge and skills needed to apply the Framework, Principles & Processes needed in OKR Planning & Implementation using the OKR-BOK™ (Body of Knowledge). Earners show a commitment to high standards, through rigorous assessment, and have demonstrated competence in using a variety of tools and techniques cognizant of the OKR-BOK™. The Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ is a life-time accreditation.
8cdc2e10-02e6-4941-b983-45ad0aea855f.name: Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ - Level 1

alignments.name: The OKR-BOK™ Competencies
alignments.description: The OKR-BOK™ core competencies were developed to support a greater understanding and application of the principles, processes and skills needed for the professional practice of OKRs as prescribed by OKR International

alignments.name: The OKR-BOK™ Ethical Guidelines
alignments.description: The OKR-BOK™ Ethical Guidelines is a code of conduct manifesto that provides appropriate guidelines, accountability and enforceable standards of conduct for all C-OKRPs who commit to abiding by the OKR-BOK™ Ethical Guidelines suggested by OKR International

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 8 hours of training that meets the OKR-BOK™ guidelines for C-OKRP™ Certification.
Pass both knowledge and skills assessments at the C-OKRP™ Certification level.

217d4c2c-a92e-4652-a702-921186cf3656.description: Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ Level 2 accredited professionals have the skills needed to put the Framework, Principles & Processes into action using the OKR-BOK™ (Body of Knowledge). Earners show a commitment to high standards, through rigorous practice and assessment, and have demonstrated competence in using a variety of skills and techniques within the OKR-BOK™. The Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ Level 2 is a life-time accreditation.
217d4c2c-a92e-4652-a702-921186cf3656.name: Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ - Level 2

alignments.name: The OKR-BOK™ Competencies
alignments.description: The OKR-BOK™ core competencies were developed to support a greater understanding and application of the principles, processes and skills needed for the professional practice of OKRs as prescribed by OKR International

alignments.name: The OKR-BOK™ Ethical Guidelines
alignments.description: The OKR-BOK™ Ethical Guidelines is a code of conduct manifesto that provides appropriate guidelines, accountability and enforceable standards of conduct for all C-OKRPs who commit to abiding by the OKR-BOK™ Ethical Guidelines suggested by OKR International

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 8 hours of training that meets the OKR-BOK™ guidelines for C-OKRP™ Level 2 Certification.
Pass both knowledge and skills assessments at the C-OKRP™ Level 2 Certification level.
Successfully completed Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP)™ - Level 1 credential from OKR International OR an equivalent credential from a recognised OKR educationist.

c9cce625-83c6-4f5e-a5ed-e3c73e31b25d.description: The OKR Foundation Course (OKR-FC™) is a certificate course meant for learners interested in understanding the foundations of OKRs or simply learning OKRs the right way. Earners have the basic knowledge needed to get started with OKRs using the OKR-BOK™ (Body of Knowledge) developed by OKR International. This foundation course also sets the stage for earners to attempt the Certified OKR Practitioner (C-OKRP™) Accreditation.
c9cce625-83c6-4f5e-a5ed-e3c73e31b25d.name: OKR Foundation Course (OKR-FC™)

alignments.name: The OKR-BOK™ Competencies
alignments.description: The OKR-BOK™ core competencies were developed to support a greater understanding and application of the principles, processes and skills needed for the professional practice of OKRs as prescribed by OKR International

badge_template_activities.title: The OKR Foundation Course (OKR-FC™) is a 2.5-hours certificate course for novices and early practitioners. This course helps you learn the foundations of OKRs through practical industry examples led by experts in OKRs. The OKR Foundation Course (OKR-FC™) is designed to ensure that you are on the right track in your OKR implementation journey. If you are curious about OKRs but not yet ready to invest in a full-fledged OKR Coach Certification, this is the perfect course for you.

8ef5574b-cebd-4021-8310-2e37be600cbc.description: The OKR International Trusted Partner badge is meant for global partners of OKR International. Earners have mastered the OKR-BOK™ (Body of Knowledge) developed by OKR International. Earners are Certified OKR Practitioners across Level 1 and Level 2 accreditation and have demonstrated solid experience in business acumen, coaching and/or OKR implementation.
8ef5574b-cebd-4021-8310-2e37be600cbc.name: OKR International Trusted Partner

badge_template_activities.title: The OKR-BOK™ (Body of Knowledge) was developed to support the highest standards of practice in the field of Objectives & Key Results. OKR International is dedicated to developing professionals interested in practicing OKRs using the OKR-BOK™. The OKR Body of Knowledge and its core competencies is designed as the industry gold standard in the helping OKR Practitioners practice OKRs within their organisation or with clients.
